spell1.name: DARK PREDATION
spell1.description: Unleash tentacles forward to attack enemies

attributes.label: INTERVAL
attributes.value: 0.9s, with a 0.1s interval between each tendril

spell2.name: FEAST OF THE ABYSS
spell2.description: Burrow underground for free movement. After a duration or by pressing Primary 1, devour enemies above to deal damage based on the enemies current health and generate equivalent Bonus Health.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast spell field that surrounds the caster

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Inflict damage equal to 50% of the target's health, followed by an additional 50 damage

attributes.label: SLOW RATE
attributes.value: Increases movement speed by 80% while active.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: 100% of damage dealt is converted into Bonus Health

spell3.name: VENOM SWING
spell3.description: Launch webbing forward, allowing for a singular swing in the desired direction

spell4.name: SYMBIOTIC RESILIENCE
spell4.description: Generate Bonus Health against damage. The lower Venom's health, the greater the Bonus Health generated.

attributes.label: HEALING
attributes.value: 100HP + 120% of missing health as bonus health

spell5.name: FRENZIED ARRIVAL
spell5.description: Dash to the target location from a certain height. Upon landing, damage nearby enemies, Launching Them Up towards the landing point.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: 65 damage, with damage falloff starting at 2m from the center of the spell field and decreasing to 40% at 6m

spell6.name: CELLULAR CORROSION
spell6.description: Unleash tentacles to Slow enemies within reach. Enemies unable to break free in time will suffer damage

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Spell field that surrounds the caster

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Deals 5 damage to nearby enemies, and an additional 80 damage if the target remains in the area at the end of the duration.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Tendrils apply a 25% Slow on the target and take 3s to inflict damage. If the distance from Venom exceeds 11m, the tendrils will detach

spell7.name: ALIEN BIOLOGY
spell7.description: Press Space to wall crawl, and while crawling, left-click to sprint
